text: Michael Morris, 3rd Baron Killanin, MBE, TD (30 July 1914 â€“ 25 April 1999) was an Irish journalist, author, and sports official. He was the sixth President of the International Olympic Committee (IOC). He became a member in the House of Lords at the Palace of Westminster as Lord Killanin upon turning 21. ==References== Category:1914 births Category:1999 deaths Category:Irish writers Category:Irish journalists Category:Presidents of the International Olympic Committee Category:Writers from London
